Septoplasty with partial inferior middle.context: Operations Performed: Septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with KTP laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal se.context: Operative Diagnoses: Chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

The patient was taken to the operating r.context: The patient was taken to the operating room.

Afrin nasal spray.context: After adequate anesthesia via endotracheal intubation, the nose was prepped with Afrin nasal spray.

1% Xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine.context: After this was done, 1% Xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine was infiltrated in both sides of the septum and the mucoperichondrium.

sinus endoscope at 25-degrees.context: The sinus endoscope at 25-degrees was then used to examine the nasal cavity in the left nasal cavity and staying lateral to the middle turbinate.

45-degree forceps.context: This was then opened with 45-degree forceps.

prominent tissue.context: There was some prominent tissue and just superior to this, the anterior ethmoid was opened.

anterior ethmoid.context: There was some prominent tissue and just superior to this, the anterior ethmoid was opened.

maxillary sinus ostium.context: The maxillary sinus ostium was then opened with 45-degree forceps.

tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillar.context: The tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus were removed and sent to pathology and labeled as left maxillary sinus mucosa.

left maxillary sinus mucosa.context: The tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus were removed and sent to pathology and labeled as left maxillary sinus mucosa.

anterior ethmoidal area.context: There was noted to have prominence in the anterior ethmoidal area.

mucosa was then removed from the anterio.context: This mucosa was then removed from the anterior area.

tissue was removed from this area.context: Tissue was removed from this area.

right maxillary mucosa.context: This was sent as right maxillary mucosa.

backbiting rongeur.context: The backbiting rongeur was then used to open up the ostium and enlarge the ostium on the right maxillary sinus.

KTP laser at 10 watts.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

submucosal resection.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

inferior turbinates.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

middle turbinates.context: Protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using KTP laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

septoplasty.context: After this was completed, a septoplasty was performed.

incision was made with a #15 blade Bard-.context: The incision was made with a #15 blade Bard-Parker knife.

flap was then elevated.context: The flap was then elevated, overlying the spur that was protruding into the right nasal cavity.

spur that was protruding into the right.context: The flap was then elevated, overlying the spur that was protruding into the right nasal cavity.

tissue was then laid back in position.context: The tissue was then laid back in position.

nasal cavity was irrigated with saline s.context: The nasal cavity was irrigated with saline solution, suctioned well as well as the oropharynx.

surgicel with antibiotic ointment.context: Surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.

3-0 nylon.context: Surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.

patient was then awakened.context: The patient was then awakened and taken to recovery room in good condition.
